QuestData.Title: Return to Sentinel Hill
QuestData.Description: The Defias Brotherhood are not a force to be taken lightly, $n. What you witnessed was the birth of a ruthless organization of criminals that will stop at nothing to see Stormwind turned to rubble.$B$BI need you to return to Sentinel Hill and let Gryan know that we are sending him troops. I hope it's not too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Marshal Gryan Stoutmantle at Sentinel Hill in Westfall.
QuestData.RewardText: Five years of work burned to the ground in five minutes. Damn the Defias!$B$BAnd this is only the beginning, $n! We have a long, hard road ahead of us.
